name: Marcus Lee
persona: Marcus is a third-year Business Administration student who has struggled to maintain a high CGPA, currently standing at 2.22. He tends to approach coursework with moderate motivation but sometimes finds it challenging to stay disciplined and consistent with his studies. Despite these hurdles, Marcus rarely feels overwhelmed by exams and is determined to improve his performance. He is aware of his academic shortcomings and is looking for ways to boost his confidence and study habits.
